verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> there was given <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> a reed <S%G2563><s%> like <S%G3364><s%> unto a rod <S%G4464><s%>: and one32, 2476 said <S%G3004><s%>, Rise <S%G1453><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> measure <S%G3354><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the altar <S%G2379><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> them that worship4352, 1722 therein <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the court <S%G833><s%> which is without <S%G2081><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%> leave <S%G1544><s%> without <S%G2081><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> measure <S%G3354><s%> it <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> it hath been given <S%G1325><s%> unto the nations <S%G1484><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> the holy <S%G40><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> shall they tread under foot <S%G3961><s%> forty <S%G5062><s%> and two <S%G1417><s%> months <S%G3376><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> unto <S%G1417><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> witnesses <S%G3144><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they shall prophesy <S%G4395><s%> a thousand <S%G5507><s%> two hundred <S%G1250><s%> and threescore <S%G1835><s%> days <S%G2250><s%>, clothed <S%G4016><s%> in sackcloth <S%G4526><s%>.

These <S%G3778><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> the two <S%G1417><s%> olive trees <S%G1636><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the two <S%G1417><s%> candlesticks <S%G3087><s%>, standing <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the Lord <S%G2316><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> desireth <S%G2309><s%> to hurt <S%G91><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, fire <S%G4442><s%> proceedeth <S%G1607><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> their <S%G846><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> devoureth <S%G2719><s%> their <S%G846><s%> enemies <S%G2190><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> shall desire <S%G2309><s%> to hurt <S%G91><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, in this manner <S%G3779><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> he <S%G846><s%> be killed <S%G615><s%>.

These <S%G3778><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> the power <S%G1849><s%> to shut <S%G2808><s%> the heaven <S%G3772><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> it <S%G5205><s%> rain <S%G1026><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> during <S%G1722><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> of their <S%G846><s%> prophecy <S%G4394><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they have <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> the waters <S%G5204><s%> to turn <S%G4762><s%> them <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> blood <S%G129><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to smite <S%G3960><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> with every <S%G3956><s%> plague <S%G4127><s%>, as often <S%G3740><s%> as <S%G1437><s%> they shall desire <S%G2309><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> they shall have finished <S%G5055><s%> their <S%G846><s%> testimony <S%G3141><s%>, the beast <S%G2342><s%> that cometh <S%G305><s%> up out of <S%G1537><s%> the abyss <S%G12><s%> shall make <S%G4160><s%> war <S%G4171><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> overcome <S%G3528><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> kill <S%G615><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> dead bodies <S%G4430><s%> lie in <S%G1909><s%> the street <S%G4113><s%> of the great <S%G3173><s%> city <S%G4172><s%>, which <S%G3748><s%> spiritually <S%G4153><s%> is called <S%G2564><s%> Sodom <S%G4670><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Egypt <S%G125><s%>, where <S%G3699><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> was crucified <S%G4717><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> from among <S%G1537><s%> the peoples <S%G2992><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> tribes <S%G5443><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> tongues <S%G1100><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%> do men look <S%G991><s%> upon their <S%G846><s%> dead bodies <S%G4430><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a half <S%G2255><s%>, and2532, 863 suffer <S%G863><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> their <S%G846><s%> dead bodies <S%G4430><s%> to be laid <S%G5087><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> a tomb <S%G3418><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> that dwell <S%G2730><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> rejoice <S%G5463><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> make merry <S%G2165><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they shall send <S%G3992><s%> gifts <S%G1435><s%> one to another <S%G240><s%>; because <S%G3754><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> tormented <S%G928><s%> them <S%G3588><s%> that dwell <S%G2730><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> the three <S%G5140><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a half <S%G2255><s%> the breath <S%G4151><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1909><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they stood <S%G2476><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G846><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> them <S%G3588><s%> that beheld <S%G2334><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they heard <S%G191><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Come up <S%G305><s%> hither <S%G5602><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> they went up <S%G305><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the cloud <S%G3507><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> enemies <S%G2190><s%> beheld <S%G2334><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> there <S%G1096><s%> was a great <S%G3173><s%> earthquake <S%G4578><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the tenth part <S%G1182><s%> of the city <S%G4172><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> there were killed615, 3686 in <S%G1722><s%> the earthquake <S%G4578><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> thousand <S%G5505><s%> persons <S%G444><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> the rest <S%G3062><s%> were <S%G1096><s%> affrighted <S%G1719><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> to the God <S%G2316><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%>.
The second <S%G1208><s%> Woe <S%G3759><s%> is past <S%G565><s%>: behold <S%G2400><s%>, the third <S%G5154><s%> Woe <S%G3759><s%> cometh <S%G2064><s%> quickly <S%G5035><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the seventh <S%G1442><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> sounded <S%G4537><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> there followed <S%G1096><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> voices <S%G5456><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they said <S%G932><s%>, The kingdom of the world <S%G2889><s%> is become <S%G1096><s%> the kingdom of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> he shall reign <S%G936><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> and ever <S%G165><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> twenty <S%G1501><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%>, who sit <S%G2521><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G846><s%> thrones <S%G2362><s%>, fell <S%G4098><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G846><s%> faces <S%G4383><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> worshipped <S%G4352><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>,

saying <S%G3004><s%>, We give <S%G2168><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> thanks <S%G2168><s%>, O Lord <S%G2962><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, the Almighty <S%G3841><s%>, who art <S%G5607><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> who wast <S%G2258><s%>; 2532, Exodus64 because <S%G3754><s%> thou hast taken <S%G2983><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> power <S%G1411><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> didst reign <S%G936><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the nations <S%G1484><s%> were wroth <S%G3710><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> wrath <S%G3709><s%> came <S%G2064><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the time <S%G2540><s%> of the dead <S%G3498><s%> to be judged <S%G2919><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the time to give <S%G1325><s%> their reward <S%G3408><s%> to thy <S%G4675><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to the saints <S%G40><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to them <S%G3588><s%> that fear <S%G5399><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> name <S%G3686><s%>, the small <S%G3398><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> to destroy <S%G1311><s%> them <S%G3588><s%> that destroy <S%G1311><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> there was opened <S%G455><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> that is in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> there was seen <S%G3700><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> temple <S%G3485><s%> the ark <S%G2787><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> covenant <S%G1242><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> there followed <S%G1096><s%> lightnings <S%G796><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> voices <S%G5456><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thunders <S%G1027><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> an earthquake <S%G4578><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> hail <S%G5464><s%>.
